quotes.quote: You can only end a negotiation for peace if you begin it.
To win a negotiation you have to show you're willing to walk away. And the best way to show you're willing to walk away is to walk away.
The only thing certain about any negotiation is that it will lead to another negotiation.
In any negotiation, the one who first gives a number is the loser.

The most difficult thing in any negotiation, almost, is making sure that you strip it of the emotion and deal with the facts. And there was a considerable challenge to that here and understandably so.
Before a negotiation can proceed and be completed, what is outside the scope of negotiation needs to be agreed.
Either we're going to solve this by realistic negotiation or there will be blood on the border.
During a negotiation, it would be wise not to take anything personally. If you leave personalities out of it, you will be able to see opportunities more objectively.
Relationships are a constant negotiation and balance.
The negotiations must address all aspects, both peace and withdrawal.
In all negotiations of difficulty, a man may not look to sow and reap at once; but must prepare business, and so ripen it by degrees.
Everything is negotiable. Whether or not the negotiation is easy is another thing.
So much of life is a negotiation - so even if you're not in business, you have opportunities to practice all around you.
No issue can be negotiated unless you first have the clout to compel negotiation.
Negotiation builds a team as well as a set of requirements.
If you come to a negotiation table saying you have the final truth, that you know nothing but the truth and that is final, you will get nothing.

quotes.cite: D. Mark Kilgour & Keith W. Hipel
quotes.quote: A negotiation is a strategic conflict.
Each negotiation is embedded in a larger context of co-being, which involves empathy and awareness of common goal/condition.
We cannot negotiate with people who say what's mine is mine and what's yours is negotiable.
Negotiation is like an athletic contest; Momentum is paramount!!
Negotiation talks are the best way to solve anything. We must replace wars and weapons with negotiations and talks.
Every day's a negotiation and sometimes it's done with guns.
Any negotiation on the basis of land for peace is a fatal mistake.
The trick to negotiation was to hold all the cards going in and, even if you didn't, to try to look as though you did.
If you are planning on doing business with someone again, don't be too tough in the negotiations. If you're going to skin a cat, don't keep it as a house cat.
Negotiation means getting the best of your opponent.
Negotiations are a euphemism for capitulation if the shadow of power is not cast across the bargaining table.
Negotiation in the classic diplomatic sense assumes parties more anxious to agree than to disagree.
Conflict is good in a negotiation process. it's the clash of two ideas, which then, all being well, produces a third idea.
Negotiating a deal can only take place when there are two parties. If you wait too long, the other party may already have negotiated a deal with someone else.
